ILCO.TA.summary: Israel Corporation Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the specialty minerals and chemicals, and refining and petrochemicals businesses in Israel, Europe, North America, Asia, South America, and internationally. It extracts raw materials, including potash and bromine from Dead Sea; and specialty phosphates from phosphate rock mines. The company offers bromine-based flame retardants and industrial solutions; elemental bromine; bromine compounds; magnesium; phosphorous-based industrial compounds; specialty agriculture products; phosphate fertilizers; green phosphoric acid; phosphorus-based flame retardants; clear brine fluids; calcium products; brominated biocides; organic and inorganic bromides; potassium chloride; magnesium dichloride; and magnesia products. It also provide specialty fertilizers, including soluble fertilizers, which includes water-soluble straights and water-soluble NPK; controlled release fertilizers; and liquid NPK fertilizers. In addition, the company produces fuel products; raw materials for the petrochemical industry; materials for the plastics industry; and oils, waxes, and related products, as well as provides power and water, including steam services to various industries in Haifa. Its products are primarily used in the areas of agriculture, electronics, construction, automotive, oil drilling, food, furniture, pharmaceutical, textile, water treatment, metal treatment, oral care, carbonated drinks, asphalt modification, paints and coatings, and other industries. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

KAFR.TA.summary: Kafrit Industries (1993) Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells customized masterbatches and compounds for the plastic industry worldwide. The company offers masterbatches and compounds for polycarbonate and PMMA sheets, halogen free solutions for sheets and pipes, agricultural films, polyethylene packaging polypropylene cast and calender films, and blowing agents. It also provides CONSTAB and CONPEEL compounds, injection/blow moldings, and antioxidants; Ecocell, a revolutionary foaming agent to reduce material and resin consumption; BOPE, a sustainable solution for flexible packaging films; and antimony free/reduced antimony FR solutions. The company offers its products for various applications, such as packaging films, including BOPP, CPP, and PE, as well as PC sheet, agricultural derivatives, biopolymers, flame retardant, PEX pipes, fibers, and nonwovens. Kafrit Industries (1993) Ltd was founded in 1973 and is based in Sha'ar HaNegev, Israel.

POLP.TA.summary: Polyram Plastic Industries LTD manufactures and supplies thermoplastic compounds. Its products include engineering plastics; functional polymers, including coupling agents, compatibilizers, impact modifiers, and adhesive resins for applications in automotive, multi-layer film, industrial, and packaging; polytron materials, which are primarily used in automotive sector; and purging agents. The company offers its products through distributors in Israel and internationally. Polyram Plastic Industries LTD was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Moshav Ram-On, Israel.

PVNNF.summary: P.V. Nano Cell Ltd. engages in developing, manufacturing, marketing, and commercializing conductive inks for digital inkjet conductive printing applications. The company develops the Sicrys family of single crystal nano-metric conductive inks; and silver-based Sicrys inks for photovoltaic and printed electronics (PE) applications. It also offers copper-based nano-metric inks for mass-production of PE. In addition, the company manufactures printing machines, which offer solutions for inkjet print-quality technologies. It operates in Israel, Germany, France, Holland, Austria, the United States, and internationally. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Migdal Ha'Emek, Israel.

RIMO.TA.summary: Rimoni Industries Ltd. engages in the design, engineering, and manufacturing of molds, and precise injection molding and assemblies for the medical, automotive, agricultural, high-tech, and consumer industries in Israel. It offers hardened steel molds, including multi-cavity molds, molds with hot runner systems, prototype molds for complex and intricate products, molds for micro-precision parts, over-moldings, and others. The company also provides precision plastic parts by thermoplastic injection molding; and assembly services for injection molding products. Rimoni Industries Ltd. was founded in 1954 and is based in Modi'in-Maccabim-Re'ut, Israel.
